name: 1945:Air Warriors
description:
1945:Air Warriors -The classic, long-run shooting game from the 90s has been perfectly remade for smart phones.
Full HD image processing effects, particle effects and massive explosions players will bring cool air combat aircraft S-class combat experience, dazzling barrage design, smooth operation mode and switching a variety of weapons, so you can control your own fighter game world with endless enemy combatants, enjoy flying in space combat experience perfect!
